symbol.provider.description: Allows external sources to suggest symbols for a given file or project.

visitEntriesOnKeyboardMovement.description: Reveal symbols in the editor whenever their entries in the outline view are visited with core keyboard commands. If false, you must use `Return` (or its equivalent) to reveal a symbol after it’s been focused.

showOnRightSide.description: When enabled, outline view will appear in the right-side dock by default instead of the left-side dock.

ignoredSymbolTypes.description: A comma-separated list of symbol types to ignore, keyed on a symbol’s `icon` or `kind`. Hover over a symbol in the outline; if a string appears in parentheses in the tooltip, that value can be used to ignore that kind of symbol. **All descendants of an ignored symbol will also be ignored.**

nameOverflowStrategy.description: What to do when an item’s name is too long to fit in the dock. The `scroll` option will overflow and add a horizontal scrollbar; the `ellipsis` option will truncate the symbol name with an ellipsis (`…`).
